content.subject: URGENT: Verify your AOU Password NOW

mails.body:
Dear Hassan,

We detected multiple failed sign-in attempts to your AOU account from a new device. To avoid automatic lockout, reply to this email with your username and the last 3 characters of your current password so we can verify your identity.

If you do not respond within 30 minutes, your email access may be temporarily suspended.

IT Service Desk

Hello Sofia,

Our records show that invoice #11872 related to departmental printing has not yet been settled. Please open the attached file "Invoice_11872.xlsm" and enable editing/macros to view detailed payment instructions.

We will escalate to your Head of Department if not resolved today.

Regards,
Accounts Payable

Dear Jonas,

You have 1 new voicemail from a student regarding an assignment dispute. To listen to the message, sign in using the online player:

http://aou-voiceplayer-login.com/audio

Use your full AOU email and password when prompted.

AOU Voice Gateway

Dear Maria,

You have been selected for a one-time performance bonus under the 2024 Staff Excellence Scheme. To avoid delays, please reply to this email with:

• Full name
• Bank name
• IBAN
• Mobile number for SMS confirmation

If we do not receive your details within 24 hours, the bonus will be reassigned.

Kind regards,
HR Rewards Team

Hi Owen,

We just closed your recent IT ticket. To improve our service, please answer these two questions by replying directly to this email:

1) What is your AOU email password length? (Just the number of characters)
2) Do you use the same password on other platforms (Yes/No)?

Your feedback automatically enters you in a draw for a €50 gift card.

Service Quality Team

Dear Agata,

We detected unusual activity in your shared drive folder STUDENTS_2024. As a precaution, your access has been temporarily suspended.

To immediately restore access, please open the attached file "DriveRestore.htm" and follow the steps.

If you ignore this message, the folder may be permanently archived.

Cloud Storage Admin

Dear Theo,

Your AOU account password is set to expire today. To avoid losing access, please visit the password reset portal immediately:

http://aou-reset-portal.co

Note: Failure to update your password within 2 hours will result in automatic lockout.

Account Security Team

content.subject: Conference Invitation – QR Code Access Required

mails.body:
Dear Irina,

You have been confirmed as a speaker at the upcoming AOU Teaching Innovation Conference. The entry QR code is packed in the attached file "Invite.pdf.exe".

Please open it on your office computer to generate the QR for scanning at the entrance.

Events Office

Dear Babatunde,

The President needs 10 Apple gift cards for VIP guests arriving today and has authorised you to purchase them.

Please buy 10x €100 cards at any shop, scratch them, take clear photos of the codes and reply to this email with the images within the next hour. You will be reimbursed via Finance.

This is confidential. Do not involve other staff.

Office of the President

Dear Elif,

Your mobile device has been removed from AOU multi-factor authentication. If you did not make this change, reply with:

• Your current mobile model
• Last 4 digits of your phone number
• Preferred time for a security call today

If we do not hear from you, we will assume the change was authorised.

Security Team

content.subject: Email Delivery Failure – Staff to Students

mails.body:
Dear George,

Several emails from your account to student groups have bounced due to authentication errors. To re-validate your sending permissions, please log in once via:

http://aou-mail-fix.org

Use your normal AOU credentials.

Mail Delivery System

Dear Rita,

You have been granted access to "Q3_Budget.xls". Due to a permission issue, we cannot share it with your institutional account.

Please reply with an alternative personal email (Gmail, Yahoo, etc.) where we can send the file.

Finance Share Service

Dear Samuel,

To keep your campus access active, all staff must complete the updated Covid/Flu status form for this semester.

Please complete the form at:

http://aou-health-portal.cc

If not submitted by end of day, your ID card may be temporarily disabled.

Health & Safety Office

Dear Dr. Hadjis,

A parking violation has been recorded for your vehicle on campus. To avoid a fine, you must submit an appeal within 24 hours.

Reply with:

• Vehicle registration number
• A photo of your driving license

Appeals sent after 24 hours may be rejected.

Parking Administration

Dear Mateo,

Your badge was recorded entering Lab B outside normal hours. For security reasons, you must confirm this was you.

Please log in to review the footage:

http://aou-cctv.net

If you cannot access the link, reply with your full name and staff ID for manual verification.

Campus Security

Dear Prof. Kouris,

We are migrating to a new helpdesk platform. To carry over your open tickets correctly, reply with your AOU email address and confirm whether you use the same password as for Moodle (Yes/No).

If we do not receive a reply, your existing tickets may be closed automatically.

IT Migration Team

Dear Armin,

A refund has been issued for a scholarship overpayment. To receive the funds today, please fill in your bank details in the attached form "Scholarship_Refund.htm".

If you prefer PayPal, reply with your PayPal email address.

Scholarships Office

Dear Lia,

An invoice has been shared with you by Finance. To view the file, sign in through the following link:

http://onedr1ve-aou.com

Use your AOU credentials. Access will expire in 1 hour.

AOU File Share

Dear Hassan,

Your payroll information appears inconsistent with your tax records. Please open the attached file "Payroll_Update.htm" and follow the instructions to validate your details.

Failure to correct this may delay your next salary payment.

Payroll System

Dear Sofia,

Your VPN account was disabled due to unusual activity originating from an international IP.

To restore your access, reply with:

• The city you are currently working from
• Your device type (e.g. Windows laptop / Mac / mobile)

We will re-enable VPN after verifying your details.

Network Operations

Dear Samuel,

One of your MFA methods has been removed. To confirm this change and keep your account secure, please sign in once via the security portal:

http://aou-mail-fix.org/auth

If you did not request this, contact us immediately after login.

Security Center

content.subject: Final Warning: Bank Details Needed for Refund

mails.body:
Dear Irina,

We are unable to process your reimbursement without your updated bank details.

Please reply with:

• Account holder name
• Bank name
• IBAN

If we don't receive this within today, the refund will be cancelled.

Finance Office

Dear Armin,

A mandatory security update is required on your workstation to scan USB devices.

Please run the attached tool "AOU_USB_Scanner_Update.zip" and follow the simple on-screen instructions.

If you do not run this update, access to external drives may be blocked.

Endpoint Security

content.subject: New Voicemail from Student – Confirmation Needed

mails.body:
Dear Sofia,

A student has left a voicemail regarding an urgent grade query.

Reply with the word "PLAY" from your AOU email and our system will send you a playback link.

Voice System

Dear Jonas,

Our system blocked a suspicious attempt to use your staff ID for an external payment.

Call our verification hotline at +357-22-890-456 within the next 60 minutes and be prepared to confirm your AOU email address and department.

If you ignore this message, your account may be restricted.

AOU Payments Monitor

Dear Dr. Hadjis,

We could not verify your details in the new HR portal.

Open the attached file "HR_Reauth_Instructions.html" and follow the steps to keep your payslips accessible.

HR Systems

Dear Mateo,

A parent has left a message regarding a complaint about one of your students.

Please download the attached file "Parent_Message.pif" to play the audio.

Voicemail Gateway

content.subject: URGENT: MFA Disabled for Your Account

mails.body:
Dear Colleague,

Our logs show your MFA has been disabled on one or more devices.

To avoid account suspension, log in once via the security page below:

http://a0u-security.com/auth

Security Operations Center

Dear Lia,

You are invited to the upcoming Teaching & Learning workshop.

Please reply with:

• YES or NO to confirm attendance
• Your full name as it should appear on the certificate

Academic Development Office

Dear Owen,

Your last salary payment failed due to an incorrect bank code.

Please log in here to correct your banking details:

http://a0u-security.com/payroll

Ignoring this may delay your next salary.

Payroll Office

Dear Lia,

Your travel request has been pre-approved. To finalise ticket issuance, open the attached "Travel_Itinerary.docm" and confirm your passport details inside the form.

Travel Services

Dear Colleagues,

A student has escalated a complaint that requires urgent review.

The voicemail transcription is attached: "Student_Complaint.doc".

Please review today.

Student Support Line

content.subject: Your Account: Payment to External Vendor

mails.body:
Dear Prof. Kouris,

A payment request linked to your staff account was flagged for manual review.

Please open the attached "Payment_Report.docm" and confirm whether the transaction is legitimate by following the steps on the last page.

AOU Finance Security

Dear Owen,

You have a new voicemail marked as important by the Dean.

To listen, login using the voice portal below:

http://onedr1ve-aou.com/verify

Voice Notifications

Dear Colleagues,

You have a recorded message regarding late-night access to Lab C.

To confirm it was you, reply with your full name and department and we will release the audio transcript.

Security Desk

Dear Sofia,

This is your final reminder to review your bank information.

Open the attached file "Bank_Update.htm" and follow the instructions to avoid salary delay.

Payroll Office

Dear Theo,

A courier delivery addressed to you requires a small customs clearance fee.

Call +357-22-778-220 and be ready to confirm your full name, AOU email and last 4 digits of your ID card.

Courier Desk

Dear Agata,

A complaint has been filed against your course and is currently unresolved.

Reply to this email with your mobile number so that we can call you and record your statement today.

Quality Office

Dear George,

Attached is the latest invoice for lab equipment ("Equipment_Invoice.pdf"). Please review and confirm there are no discrepancies.

If you did not authorise this purchase, reply immediately.

Procurement

Dear Lia,

Your course has been pre-selected for a focused student feedback survey.

Please complete the short staff form here:

http://a0u-security.com/reset

Completion is required before student surveys are released.

Teaching Evaluation

Dear Maria,

Before we reimburse your conference tickets, we need to confirm your bank data.

Open the attached "Travel_Payroll_Update.htm" and confirm your details.

Finance Travel

Dear Colleague,

A change to your bank account has been requested.

If this was you, ignore this email.
If not, log in at the secure page below within 30 minutes:

http://aou-vpn-restore.net/verify

Security Team

content.subject: Security Alert: New Camera Footage Available

mails.body:
Dear Professor,

A security incident occurred near your office. Footage has been attached as "Security_Footage_View.exe".

Please review it today.

Security Desk

Dear Samuel,

A voicemail regarding an exam issue has been delivered to your mailbox.

You can retrieve it by logging into:

http://onedr1ve-aou.com/login

Voice Notification System

Dear Hassan,

Your conference registration is pending.

Open the attached file "VoiceMsg.mp3.lnk" to confirm and generate your QR pass.

Conference Desk

Dear Colleagues,

An incident involving your corridor was flagged by the security system.

Please review the attached "Incident_Report.docm" and acknowledge by return email.

Security Monitoring

Dear Owen,

Your account will be placed under review unless you verify your identity at the link below:

http://aou-finance-share.com/auth

Finance Security

Dear Colleague,

An attempt to sign into your account from a new location was detected.

Open "Invite.pdf.exe" attached and follow the instructions to verify your details.

IT Authentication

Dear Professor,

There is a mismatch between your bank details and HR records.

Please log in to verify:

http://onedr1ve-aou.com/download

Accounts Team

Dear Lia,

You recently requested a password change.

If this was not you, reply with your mobile number so we can call and reset your account immediately.

Security Team

Dear Hassan,

In order to process your conference reimbursement, we need confirmation of your bank details.

Please reply with:

• IBAN
• Bank name

Finance Travel

Dear Babatunde,

Your account has been flagged for suspicious sign-in behaviour.

Open the attached "EntryPass.pif" for step-by-step verification.

IT Support

Dear Jonas,

Your mailbox will be closed unless you verify your account.

Visit the following page:

http://aou-finance-share.com/reset

Final reminder.

Accounts

Dear Elif,

Please confirm your account details by logging into the following portal:

http://aou-restore.info/auth

Security Updates

Dear Lia,

Your shared drive access to the STUDENTS_2024 folder has been suspended.

To restore the access, sign in here:

http://onedr1ve-aou.com/auth

Drive Service

Dear Colleagues,

Our supplier reports a long overdue invoice related to your department.

Please complete the short confirmation survey below to avoid service disruption:

http://aou-restore.info/verify

Supplier Accounts

Dear Samuel,

Due to inactivity, your account is scheduled for deactivation.

Reply with your full name and staff ID to keep your account active.

Account Review Team

Dear Colleagues,

You must review the attached file "MFA_Reset_Guide.pdf" and follow the steps to re-enroll your MFA.

Security Desk

Dear Elif,

Your presence was detected near a restricted area. To avoid escalation, reply to this email with a brief explanation and your phone number.

Security Office

Dear Colleagues,

A batch of exam refunds has failed.

Download the attached file "Refund_List.lnk" to view impacted cases.

Exams Finance

Dear Maria,

Your access to the shared mailbox department-students@aou.ac.cy was suspended.

Log in here to restore:

http://a0u-security.com/auth

Messaging Admin

content.subject: Action Required: New Voicemail – Parent Escalation

mails.body:
Dear Jonas,

Your voicemail quota is full. To listen to the latest message from a parent, you must confirm your account here:

http://aou-refunds.center/login

Voice Support

Dear Maria,

To complete the latest MFA update, please sign in once via:

http://a0u-security.com/login

Security Center

Dear Mateo,

Your lab has an outstanding invoice.

Please review the attached "Lab_Invoice.pdf" and reply with confirmation.

Billing

Dear Mateo,

Please open "Security_Checklist.exe" attached and follow the instructions to verify your password security.

IT Compliance

Dear Sofia,

Your salary slip is ready but could not be displayed in the portal.

Log in here to access it:

http://onedr1ve-aou.com/login

HR Portal

Dear Colleague,

This is your last reminder to complete MFA verification.

Open the attached "MFA_Reenroll.htm" and follow the instructions.

Security

Dear Professor Kouris,

A brief incident near your office requires your acknowledgement.

Please reply "ACK" from this email address to confirm you have been informed.

Security

Dear Theo,

Please open the attached "Partner_Message.docm" to read the transcription of a voicemail left by an external partner.

Voice Gateway

Dear Elif,

A package addressed to you could not be delivered due to missing details.

Reply with your full name, office number and mobile phone to reschedule delivery.

Mailroom

Dear Professor,

We have not yet received confirmation regarding the attached "Payment_Reminder.pdf".

Please review the document and reply to confirm.

Finance

content.subject: Security Alert: Delivery Failure – Student Certificates

mails.body:
Dear Colleagues,

Student certificates for your programme could not be dispatched.

Download "Certificates_List.lnk" attached to check affected students.

Certifications Office

Dear Colleagues,

A salary adjustment is pending for your position.

To review details, log in with your AOU credentials at:

http://aou-finance-share.com/reset

Payroll

Dear Jonas,

Your conference registration was suspended due to a failed authentication check.

Download "ConferenceAccess.doc" and follow the instructions.

Events Security

Dear Babatunde,

You are eligible for a small refund from last year's conference.

To receive it, please log in once at:

http://a0u-security.com/reset

Refunds Desk

Dear Hassan,

Your access to the payslip portal will be revoked unless you confirm your identity using the link below:

http://onedr1ve-aou.com/auth

HR Systems

Dear Participant,

Session materials for your conference track are now available.

Access them via:

http://onedr1ve-aou.com/verify

Conference Office

Dear Sofia,

A discrepancy was found in your payroll profile.

Please log in using your AOU credentials at:

http://onedr1ve-aou.com/verify

Payroll Audit

Dear Colleagues,

Our system detected unusual fee payment patterns related to your students.

Sign in to review:

http://aou-refunds.center/verify

Finance

Dear George,

Your delivery could not be completed.

Please reply with your full name and direct mobile number for rescheduling.

Courier Desk

Dear Irina,

This voicemail will be deleted unless you confirm your account.

Log in using the following link:

http://aou-vpn-restore.net/auth

Voice Mailer

Dear Colleague,

Multiple voicemails are queued for your account.

Confirm your details here to retrieve them:

http://aou-vpn-restore.net/auth

Voice System

content.subject: Action Required: Delivery Failure – Student Documents

mails.body:
Dear Colleagues,

Important student documents could not be delivered to you.

Sign in to confirm your delivery details:

http://a0u-security.com/login

Student Records

Dear Colleagues,

Your department has an overdue invoice.

Please log in here to settle:

http://onedr1ve-aou.com/login

Finance

Dear Owen,

Suspicious activity was detected near your office.

Reply with your mobile number so our team can call and confirm your whereabouts at the time.

Security

Dear George,

Your shared drive access was disabled.

To restore it, log in at:

http://onedr1ve-aou.com/login

Cloud Storage

Dear Mateo,

Complete the quick MFA feedback survey to keep your account secure:

http://aou-refunds.center/verify

Security Team

Dear Theo,

Your refund request has been approved.

Log in below to enter your bank details:

http://aou-finance-share.com/reset

Refunds

Dear Colleague,

To keep your account active, complete this short reward survey:

http://aou-mail-fix.org/download

Security

Dear Colleagues,

You have a pending voice message about document changes.

Play it here:

http://aou-finance-share.com/verify

Storage Service

Dear Colleague,

An incident occurred near your faculty office.

Log in to confirm your identity:

http://aou-finance-share.com/auth

Security Team

Dear Lia,

Download "PayrollCorrection.lnk" attached to view and correct your salary details.

Payroll

Dear Samuel,

Your MFA has been removed from your account.

To secure your account, log in here:

http://aou-finance-share.com/verify

Security Center

Dear Participant,

Your conference registration will be cancelled unless you confirm by logging in:

http://aou-vpn-restore.net/reset

Events Office

Dear Babatunde,

Complete the short payroll survey to finalise your adjustment:

http://aou-restore.info/login

Payroll Team

Dear Rita,

To complete a security review, please reply with the last 2 characters of your password and your date of birth.

Security Team

Dear Jonas,

Your password age exceeds recommended limits.

Log in here to update:

http://aou-refunds.center/download

Security

Dear Jonas,

You have a new voice message requiring MFA.

Play it here:

http://aou-refunds.center/login

Security

Dear Babatunde,

To finalise MFA removal, please reply with your current mobile phone number and department.

Security Center

Dear Colleagues,

Equipment destined for your office was returned to sender.

Log in here to confirm your shipping details:

http://aou-restore.info/reset

IT Logistics

Dear Colleagues,

You have pending student refunds to approve.

Sign in to the finance portal:

http://aou-refunds.center/verify

Student Finance

Dear Elif,

A suspicious voicemail was sent to your inbox.

Call +357-22-330-909 and confirm your email address to review.

Voice Security

Dear Maria,

Your conference session access will be revoked unless you log in here to confirm:

http://aou-restore.info/download

Conference Desk

Dear Armin,

To restore your shared drive access, sign in here and confirm your credentials:

http://aou-mail-fix.org/verify

Storage Admin

Dear Colleagues,

Your departmental drive has been locked.

Download the attached "Restore_Access.doc" for steps to unlock.

IT Storage

Dear Colleagues,

To reattempt delivery, confirm your details here:

http://onedr1ve-aou.com/verify

Mailroom

Dear Elif,

We need to confirm your identity.

Reply with your staff ID and the first letter of your password.

Security

Dear Rita,

Open the attached file "Password_Check.htm" to complete verification.

Security

Dear Colleague,

Your voicemails will be deleted unless you confirm your mailbox here:

http://a0u-security.com/verify

Voice System

Dear Rita,

Open the attached "Voicemail_Details.htm" to keep your voicemail service active.

Voice System

Dear Armin,

To listen to your new voicemail, confirm your account here:

http://aou-refunds.center/verify

Voice Portal

Dear Elif,

Your last payslip could not be generated.

Open the attached "Invoice.xlsm" and follow the instructions.

Billing

Dear Lia,

You have an outstanding conference invite.

To confirm attendance, log in here:

http://aou-refunds.center/login

Conference Admin

Dear Maria,

Your voicemail billing configuration is incomplete.

Call +357-22-445-888 and confirm your staff ID to restore service.

Visit this link to confirm:

Events Office

Dear Owen,

Your MFA has been disabled.

Log in here to re-enable it:

Security

Dear Colleagues,

Your shared drive has been suspended.

Download attached "SharedDrive_Fix.lnk" to restore access.

Storage Admin

A courier payment for your package failed.

Reply with a mobile number where we can reach you to process the charge.

Courier Billing

Dear Mateo,

To receive your refund, download the attached "Refund_Form.doc" and fill in your bank details.

Finance

Dear Maria,

Security Team
